name: consultrade srl
goal: supportare le imprese italiane, organizzazioni, pubbliche istituzioni, università ed enti di formazione, nella ricerca e perseguimento, delle politiche europee, nei settori di riferimento: Horizon2020, Creative Europe, SME Instruments, INTERRAG, ERASMUS+, LIFE+
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Studio, perseguimento ed implementazione della azioni relative ai seguenti programmi: Horizon2020, Creative Europe, SME Instruments, INTERRAG, ERASMUS+, LIFE+
